gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Heat 117, Hawks 111
gameRecap.excerpt: The Heat defeated the Hawks, 117-111, in double overtime. Tyler Herro led all scorers with 33 points, along with five rebounds and four assists for the Heat, while Jimmy Butler added 25 points, eight rebounds and nine assists in the victory. Dejounte Murray tallied 29 points, 13 rebounds and 13 assists for the Hawks in the losing effort, his first triple-double of the season and 19th of his career. The Heat improve to 44-35 on the season, while the Hawks fall to 36-43.
